1021160.name: Fantasy Grounds - Map Pack Terrain and Battlemats (Map Pack)
1021160.description:
Map Pack Terrain and Battlemats

The party has been on the road for hours, maybe even days. As they near the settlement meant to give them refuge, they are cheered by the sight of smoke from the warming fires. But they are not yet to their destination. Instead, a battleground awaits them.
Savage Mojo has raided its vault for long lost treasures - a series of maps created by superstar artists such as Jason Engle and Aaron Acevedo. We've tidied and resized them for use with Fantasy Grounds so they can enhance your online gaming experience. Suitable for any rules system, we hope you enjoy this collection of encounter locations.
Product contains
18
high art maps with a square grid
.

Product includes GM and Player versions of:
  • Ancient Forest
  • Desert Steppes
  • Desert
  • Dragonscales Dark
  • Dragonscales Red-Gold
  • Grassland
  • Ice Realm
  • Oasis
  • Ocean Above
  • Ocean Wreckage
  • River of Souls
  • 2 Ruins
  • Scarlet Sands
  • Swamp
  • Wasteland
  • Wild Canyon Pass
  • Wild River Pass
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: Jeannette Jarrar
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
